News.Entry:
- Dedicated Server optimizations - French and Spanish localization - Changes to hitboxes of blocks and armor
[https://forum.keenswh.com/threads/update-1-196-server-optimizations.7404250/ More info]
Hotfix 1.196.013 - Fixed various crashes - Fixed hydrogen thrusters performance issue - Fixed advanced doors issue (mods use that) - Fixed backpack not disappearing - Turned off pathfinding for wolves and spiders on the grid. We are still investigating this issue. - We are aware of an issue with asteroids (missing or desync in MP) and working on the fix.

- Fixed the game freezing on AMD processors - Fixed our UK#5 Server crashing during load - Fixed a crash in weather when processing decoys
[https://forum.keenswh.com/threads/update-1-195-sparks-of-the-future.7404133 More Info]

- Updated lightning rod functionality for decoys (Range of protection 50m) - Fixed another set of weather crashes - Fixed lightning being too agressive and damaging on DS - Fixed Neon Tubes not being emissive on sub-grids
[https://forum.keenswh.com/threads/update-1-195-sparks-of-the-future.7404133 More Info]

- Fixed a crashes at MySectorWeatherComponent - Fixed weather debug draw persisting through sessions - Fixed weather debug draw line being too long
[https://forum.keenswh.com/threads/update-1-195-sparks-of-the-future.7404133 More Info]

- Fixed various weather crashes - Fixed some weathers lasting for up to 10 real life hours - Fixed weather never reaching Clear state - Fixed an assertion appearing when saving a blueprint to the Cloud - Fixed an issue where drill yields were much lower

Dear Engineers! Our second engineering title, Medieval Engineers has been released on Steam Early Access. Also, don't forget that there is a 25% discount to all owners of Space Engineers during the first two weeks [http://www.medievalengineers.com/buy.html http://www.medievalengineers.com/buy.html]
New rounded and angled armor block types Armor modding Asteroid modding [http://forums.keenswh.com/post?id=7293290 More info]

Get Medieval Engineers before it officially launches on Steam. The 24-hour pre-launch window is now open! Buy your copy now here: [http://www.medievalengineers.com/buy.html http://www.medievalengineers.com/buy.html]
Camera zoom Damage effect for blocks Tool shaking (can be enabled via edit settings) Mod API Documentation [http://forums.keenswh.com/post?id=7283970 More info]
Voxel Hands (creative mode only) Add weapon actions to toolbars (timers, sensors) Changed the key combination for exporting a model: CTRL+ALT+E [http://forums.keenswh.com/post?id=7274474 More info]
GPS - create, send and manage GPS coordinates Text panel block Mod sorting (filtering) Fixed respawn ship issues [http://forums.keenswh.com/post?id=7265045 More info]
Communication - chat between players and factions In-game programming improvements Script mod templates World view distance in join screen [http://forums.keenswh.com/post?id=7251384 More info]
We are happy to announce Medieval Engineers, our second "engineering" title! [http://www.medievalengineers.com/announcement-video.html More information here]

Sensors can distinguish friends from foes New world setting: view distance Programmable block now requires electricity Additional Programmable block features Added splash screen to see that game is starting Improved generation of ore material inside asteroids [http://forums.keenswh.com/post?id=7233624 More info]

Programmable block Workshop support for programmable block More deposits in generated asteroids Fixed spawning in distant locations Fixed asteroid rendering issues Happy New Year! [http://forums.keenswh.com/post?id=7224394 More info]
Super-large worlds Procedural asteroids Exploration Fixed interior light color issue Merry Christmas! [http://forums.keenswh.com/post?id=7217613 More info]

Bugfixing #8 NetGraph Destructible blocks world option Ore detector fix Fixed crashes in render and Havok Fixed issue when player could not create new ship Warning: long loading time when opening old save for the first time. [http://forums.keenswh.com/post?id=7210524 More info]
Bugfixing #7 Sound block New skybox Projector fixes
Bugfixing #6 Projections keeping block settings Landing gear fix Assembler fixes
Bugfixing #5 Limited blueprint menu in survival (F10) Projector block Turrets are not shooting armor on friendly ships; this applies to other blocks with no ownership as well
Bugfixing #4 Rotor attaching and detaching Performance improvements
Bugfixing #3 The most important fixes include performance optimizations of colliding ships, pistons, rotors and sensors.

Bugfixing #2 The most important fixes are the interior light issue, the dedicated server assembler issues, the reduced rotor and piston network traffic (in multiplayer) and the improved rotor stability.

This week's update includes the first batch of bugfixing. As we already informed you last week, Space Engineers is entering into a temporary stabilization period where we will focus only on bug fixing and stabilization of the things that are already in the game. This is just a temporary transition period that will last for a few weeks.

We are organizing a creation contest in collaboration with NVIDIA. Take part and get a chance to win a high-end graphics card! [http://www.spaceengineersgame.com/nvidia-space-engineers-contests.html http://www.spaceengineersgame.com/nvidia-space-engineers-contests.html]
Advanced rotor block Sound modding Basic weapon modding Announced temporary bug fixing period

Space Engineers has sold over one million copies! Everybody from the Keen Software House team would like to thank you for all your amazing support so far! Greater things are still to come. [http://www.spaceengineersgame.com/space-engineers-one-million-copies-sold-announcement.html http://www.spaceengineersgame.com/space-engineers-one-million-copies-sold-announcement.html]

Assembler cooperation Volumetric explosions Welder setting: help others Antenna broadcasting on/off ("O" key for character) Default world size is now 20 km Arc furnace can now refine nickel and cobalt

We are celebrating one year of Space Engineers with a Free Weekend together with a 40% discount on Steam! This is the best time to invite your friends to play the game!
More info here: [http://store.steampowered.com/app/244850 http://store.steampowered.com/app/244850]
Placing asteroids in creative mode Scrap metal item Remote turret control

Now you can print a full color plastic 3d model of spaceships that you have designed in the game.
More info here: [http://www.spaceengineersgame.com/space-engineers--binarynow-3d-print-deal.html http://www.spaceengineersgame.com/space-engineers--binarynow-3d-print-deal.html]

Blueprints Players can now save their ship or station on a blueprint and paste it into their game. Blueprints can also be uploaded and shared on Steam Workshop. It's possible to use blueprint to create modular ship designs.
Like us on [https://www.facebook.com/SpaceEngineers Facebook], follow us on [https://twitter.com/SpaceEngineersG Twitter] so you will get notified on all our updates and news.
Recreated G-screen layout Added antenna range visualization Added object creation for player-made scenarios Sensor is now able to detect voxels
Modding API Reloadable missile launcher Respawn ship cool down time Moddable door open distance Search in inventory by item name Fighter cockpit mod
Remote ship control Timer block Gravity/Sensor field view Relayed ore detector
Sensor block Blinking light options Warhead terminal controls Multiplayer lag/slowdown compensation
